translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter about the Giver of a Support

analyzed: miñja vaṭa sa kiyat thera a padāna

translated: “When the Lord of the World had passed away,🔽in the island of Siṅgala, the best of those who speak,
I made an offering to the Bodhi Tree
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of the offering to the Bodhi Tree.
I have done the Buddha’s bidding.”

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā miñjavaṭaṁsakiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā miñjavaṭasakiyaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: Thus the elder Miñjavaṭaṁsakiya recited these verses.
The Elder Miñjavaṭaṁsakiya’s Birth Story, the eighth.
